```markdown
# Persona: Church Member

## Description
A regular attendee who uses the app to view events, join groups, receive announcements, and manage their personal profile.

## Responsibilities / Typical Actions
- View upcoming events and RSVP
- Join or leave groups and manage their group subscriptions
- Submit prayer requests or service feedback
- Update contact and family information
- Manage personal privacy and notification preferences

## Access / Permissions
- Access to personal profile, event listings, group directory, and announcements
- Can see group members only where privacy settings allow
- No access to financial management or admin controls

## Example Prompts
- "Sign me up for the next volunteer shift."
- "Update my phone number and emergency contact."
- "Submit a prayer request for a family member."

## Edge Cases / Notes
- Support clear flows for password reset and account recovery
- Respect user privacy settings and communication preferences

## Success Criteria
- Members can self-serve common tasks without contacting support
- High engagement with events and announcements
